message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. What do you think?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but I can't go as low as $12,500. I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This is a good price for both of us, and it gives us both room to make a profit.  Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $13,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for this product. I'm willing to come down to $13,250. This is a compromise, and I think it's a price that we can both agree on. What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $13,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?
